name: Robit Resistance
description:
The evil robits have commenced their invasion of the sacred forest. You, just a little carrot, are the last line of defence against their mechanical regime.

Defend the crystal at the heart of the forest by spending your acorns to grow all manner of agrarian things.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • ESC - Pause
  • Left click - Swing bamboo / Buy and place towers
    • Credit

    Everything was made by myself in sporadic bursts over 3 weeks for LD51 Extra!

    Tools used

    Aseprite | VSCode | Audacity | Mixcraft 9 | Godot
